resources.string: Machine learning based application for forecasting Movies TV series success

The next generation app to predict Movie/TV show Success and watch them all in one place!
You can predict Movie/Tv Show whether it flop or will hit in future and then save that predictions!
You can watch trailers and whole of Movie/TV Show in best video player and best interface!
You can navigate from one screen to other by side nav,buttons and Home Screen!
You can manage your profile,change setting,rate,complain,help access, get Notification updates and much more all in one place.For use all this usefull features First you need to login!
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
Machine learning based application for forecasting Movies TV series success
(1) Hi you can improve prediction by making good quality content
(2) Save Prediction can be done as a record
(3) In Future we can update you through notifications
(4) Your feedback related to our app help us knowing what to improve
(5) Please donot share your account info and unique id keys to stay safe
